textAfterTable: 13 Songs Customer Reviews 久しぶり！           by Big Events! このメンツでのライブを見てから十数年経つのか〜。 ピュアメタルが好きな若い世代に勧めたい変わらない音楽です。 これだよ！           by warriorrr 歌とリフとメロディとスピードと哀愁を兼ね備えてます！やっぱりこういうの好きだわ～。早く来日してくれ！ちなみに、’The Privilege of Pawer’ツアーの時は高校生でした。この面子、ライブになると１．５倍速になるんですよね～。Ｔｏｎｙ　Ｍｏｏｒｅはフェイクなしだし。。 悲しい           by 死透-dai'suke- mark realeのギターが聴けるのがこれで最後なんて,……悲しい。mark realeよ永遠に…。R.I.P. Biography Formed: 1973 in New York, NY Genre: Rock Years Active: '70s, '80s, '90s, '00s, '10s The long-lived New York-based heavy metal band Riot was formed in 1976 by guitarist/songwriter Mark Reale, who recruited vocalist Guy Speranza, guitarist L.A. Kouvaris, bassist Jimmy Iommi, and drummer Peter Bitelli. After debuting in 1977 with Rock City, Kouvaris was replaced by guitarist Rick Ventura, and the group returned in 1979 with Narita; Iommi and Bitelli were the next to exit, and with the recruitment of bassist Kip Leming and drummer
